channel.title: 562 Server Source Coding Need Help
channel.description:
Where do you code in a 562 Source is the main question?
Like 317 was you go into "Client.Java" and code it all there.
Where is the "Client.Java" file to code the 562 server?
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2vm7xpl.png[/img]

item.title: 562 Server Source Coding Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“micht, post:1, topic:374949”]Where do you code in a 562 Source is the main question?

Like 317 was you go into “Client.Java” and code it all there.

Where is the “Client.Java” file to code the 562 server?

[/quote]If you knew anything about java, you’d know it’s a heavy object oriented programming language, as such you should NEVER put all your programming into one file, it’s both sloppy and just not ethical.

Now, you need to learn something that everyone that ever picks up on a project to continue has to learn – how to trace what’s happening. I advice you look in the ‘run.bat’ and figure out what class it’s running, open up that class and look at the entry point and start tracing out what all is happening.

Read full topic
